author: Eliza Relman
title: Fox News host defended anti-lockdown protesters who called Michigan's governor a Nazi as they displayed Confederate flags and swastikas
description: Fox News opinion hosts have spent the week attacking a host of governors who've issued strict stay-home orders to contain the spread of the coronavirus and cheerleading those who are protesting the orders. On Friday, Fox News host Greg Gutfeld argued that Mic…
content:
Fox News opinion hosts have spent the week attacking a host of governors who've issued strict stay home orders to contain the spread of the coronavirus and cheerleading those who are protesting the orders and violating social distancing policies. 
On Friday,… [+4486 chars]
